```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
```

# Raw data set
Letter "m" = "same", letter "n" = "different".

The 676 letter combinations were divided into 4 lists (162 different (L2&L3) + 163 different (L1&L4)) with 1 break, S & 3 practice

```{r}
#Raw with no practice, no S, and no break

RawDataSet1 <- list.files(pattern = "xP22_") %>%
  lapply(read_csv) %>% 
  bind_rows%>%
  mutate(Subject= rep(list.files(pattern = "xP22_"), each=331))%>%
  separate(`IT1 IT2 KEY RT`,c("IT1","a", "IT2","b","c","d","e","f","g","KEY", "RT"), sep = " ")%>%
  select(Subject,IT1,IT2,KEY,RT)%>%
  filter(IT1 != "S",
         IT1 !="DESCANSO")%>%
  mutate(Rubric = if_else(IT1 ==IT2, "m", "n"),
         Accuracy = if_else(KEY == Rubric, 1, 0),
         RT = as.numeric(RT))%>%
  group_by(Subject)%>%
  slice(4:329)%>%
  ungroup()

RawDataSet2 <- list.files(pattern = "yP22_") %>%
  lapply(read_csv) %>% 
  bind_rows%>%
  mutate(Subject= rep(list.files(pattern = "yP22_"), each=329))%>%
  separate(`IT1 IT2 KEY RT`,c("IT1","a", "IT2","b","c","d","e","f","g","KEY", "RT"), sep = " ")%>%
  select(Subject,IT1,IT2,KEY,RT)%>%
  filter(IT1 != "S",
         IT1 !="DESCANSO")%>%
  mutate(Rubric = if_else(IT1 ==IT2, "m", "n"),
         Accuracy = if_else(KEY == Rubric, 1, 0),
         RT = as.numeric(RT))%>%
  group_by(Subject)%>%
  slice(4:327)%>%
  ungroup()


P22RicRaw<-RawDataSet1%>%
  bind_rows(RawDataSet2)

save(P22RicRaw, file = "P22RicRaw.RData")
  
```
